description: Brenner Bolton and Jason Maddox become one with nature and one with each other in this campground fuck-fest. Brenner is being pressured to manage his family’s ranch and marry a girl, but that is the least of his concerns right now. He can only think of Jason’s throbbing cock ramming his tight, pulsating asshole. Meanwhile, Jason is more than willing to satisfy his good friend’s gay fantasies.
title: Down Low Part 1
